title: EPISTOLA David Henige
html:
EPISTOLA David Henige

On p. 14 of the latest issue, you discuss this fellow's math. Actually it can be faulted. The increase from 110% to 120% is not 10% but 9.1%

(120 divided by 110).

[David Henige]
